name: loadEntries(for:timeScope:range:completionHandler:)
desc: Returns the scores for the local player and other players for the specified type of player, time period, and ranks.
declaration:
func loadEntries(for playerScope: GKLeaderboard.PlayerScope, 
       timeScope: GKLeaderboard.TimeScope, 
           range: NSRange, 
completionHandler: @escaping (GKLeaderboard.Entry?, [GKLeaderboard.Entry]?, Int, Error?) -> Void)
